summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of unplatted property in the SW 1/4 of SE 1/4 of NE 1/4 of Section 23-24-3, and Lot 8, Herbert's Addition (Unrec.); Lot 8 and southwesterly 80 feet of Lot 5, Block 98, Terry's 2nd Addition; portion of Hanford's Donation Claim \#44; the north 60 feet of Lots 1 through 6, Block 14, Squire Park Addition; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-333 and 17-262, respectively.
